overview:
Giancarlo Maniaci is the founder and CEO of www.TapIt.com, an global mobile advertising network that provides advanced technology that enables mobile targeting and delivery for advertiser and agencies. The company serves billions of mobile ad impressions monthly and works closely with ComScore 1000 publishers, Android and iOs Applications Developers, Mobile Web Publishers, advertisers and agencies in the mobile media space. Giancarlo Maniaci is passionate about mobile, and the future of new and mobile media.

Additionally, Giancarlo Maniaci is an incubator and seed investor for www.PayDivvy.com, an exciting social start up that will disrupt the social payments space and change the way money is handled between friends, family, co-workers and business’ around the globe!
